article_title: Jobs Are Growing. Health Care is Booming. So Why Are Hospitals Flat?

article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond

og.description: Friday's jobs report was a little lower than expected, but still contained positive news for the economy: The workforce grew again in July, as employers added more than 200,000 new jobs for the sixth straight month.
